headline: How Investors May Respond To Expedia Group (EXPE) Wetour Integration of AI Trip Planner and B2B APIs
summary: In recent days, Webus International Limited announced its Wetour platform will integrate Expedia Group's newly launched AI-powered Trip Planner and B2B APIs, aiming to boost hotel booking efficiency and personalized travel experiences for global users. This move highlights increasing adoption of Expedia's AI-driven capabilities by partners, signaling expanding influence of its tools across the online travel industry. We'll examine how Wetour's adoption of Expedia's AI suite could enhance B2B...

headline: Will Agentic AI Turn OTAs Into Passive Order Takers?
summary: No one yet knows who will be the winners and losers in the agentic AI battle. Developments are happening too fast. But few would argue with the fact that the online travel agencies face a substantial disruption risk.
